short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps in tracking DX.com shipments to India.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension assists you in keeping track of DealExtreme.com shipments to India locations.

1. Track and manage ShipmentIds from Popup accessible from Chrome toolbar.
2. Omnibox integration to show latest shipment status on IPS portal.
3. One-click to add shipmentIds directly from DX.com shipment details page.
